OrgName.entry: LOVEBYTES INTERNATIONAL FESTIVAL OF DIGITAL ART

Desc.entry: Art festival that explores the creative and cultural potential of digital technologies, featuring exhibitions, live performances, film screenings, workshops and talks. Takes place annually in spring at venues across the city. Organised by Lovebytes Ltd (not-for-profit organisation). Artwork from previous festivals can be viewed at www.lovebytes.tv and at www.flickr.com/photos/lovebytes/sets.

Pubs.entry: Programme; occasional compendiums of artwork in digital format
